text: Bothroponera tesseronoda, is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae, which can be found from India, and Sri Lanka. ==References== ==External links== * * at antwiki.org *Animaldiversity.org *Itis.org *Asian myrmecology Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1877
title: Bothroponera tesseronoda
